sect1.title: Data Call Service
sect1.para: The data call service is used for data connection like browser, etc.

sect2.title: Setup Data Call
sect2.para: RIL uses SETUP_DATA_CALL(27) request for this. AP framework would do a lot of check to make sure all conditions are meet, before sending this request to BP.
These checking logic can found in framework code.
After all condition meets, the setup request would send to RIL. The whole setup request contains many fields, current definition is:

row.entry: 0(Never PAP/CHAP), 1(may PAP, Never CHAP), 2(may CHAP, Never PAP),3(may PAP/CHAP, depend on BP code)

sect2.title: Condition Checking
sect2.para: The isDataAllowed() would do all the condition checking. If any of them have incorrect status, it'll refuse send SETUP_DATA_CALL to RIL.

sect2.title: Data Registration State
sect2.para: RIL use RIL_REQUEST_DATA_REGISTRATION_STATE to get current data registration state.
The data fields of DATA_REGISTRATION_STATE are similar as voice reg state:

row.entry: 0-Not Reg,and is not searching,1-Reg,home network,2-Not Reg, but is under searching,3-Reg denied,4-Unknow,5-Reg,roaming.
LAC if registered or NULL if not
CID if registered or NULL if not.
deny reason for the registration failure.
